participant_1.background:
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i am a marathon runner.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.

participant_2.background:
I lost my favorite fishing pole in a boating accident.
my favorite book is anne of green gables.
I have always been close to my parents.
i work at a grocery store.
I enjoy being outdoors and taking my laptop with me to keep up with my interests in aviation and ballet.

content.text: Not much! My favorite book is Anne of Green Gables. What's yours?
I haven't read that one, but I've heard good things about it! I love to sing show tunes - my favorite is 'Defying Gravity' from Wicked.
Wicked was a great show! I've seen it twice. I love ballet and aviation, so I like to take my laptop with me when I'm outdoors and do research on those topics.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to ballet dance. I'm a marathon runner and I love to knit sweaters - I just finished one that's so warm and comfy!
Knitting is so relaxing. I lost my favorite fishing pole in a boating accident a few years ago, but I still love to fish.
Oh no! That's terrible. I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It was a sad day, but I'm still able to enjoy fishing without it.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a chef, and I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams!
That's awesome! I'm a grocery store manager, so I'm always around food.
Great! Maybe we can cook together sometime.
Sounds good! Have a great day!
